long-title: Ayunda Risu's Peanuts! (⊙＿⊙) Where is risu's peanuts~?
about-description:
This is a personal project made and maintained by iDevoid to support Indonesian VTuber (Virtual YouTuber), hoping for their success. Anyone is welcomed to improve the language and the site itself.
Want to contribute? submit it here! (Google form)
